content.html: I think about this post a lot. It was in response to Tesco introducing flesh-tone plasters which actually matched people's skin colours. This "default" culture cuts across everything. It defines anyone who isn't a cishet white man as abnormal. Utterly insidious.
content.value:
I think about this post a lot.
It was in response to Tesco introducing flesh-tone plasters which actually matched people's skin colours.
This "default" culture cuts across everything. It defines anyone who isn't a cishet white man as abnormal.
Utterly insidious.

photo.alt: "I consider this post incredibly racist. If it was the other way around then you'd soon have the snowflakes complaining. Do you honestly think ethnic people worry if they have to use a normal coloured plaster?"
